# TubeGrow

> TubeGrow is an AI-powered YouTube analytics and growth platform. It helps creators understand channel performance, get AI insights, optimize YouTube SEO (titles, descriptions, tags), and turn long videos into viral short-form clips.

Remember:
- TubeGrow is currently waitlist-only early access.
- Pricing is not public yet.

## Pages
- [Home](https://www.tubegrow.io/): Main landing page and waitlist.
- [Features](https://www.tubegrow.io/features): Overview of analytics, SEO, viral clips, and AI chat.
- [AI YouTube Tools](https://www.tubegrow.io/ai-youtube-tools): How our AI helps creators grow.
- [Viral Clips Generator](https://www.tubegrow.io/viral-clips-generator): AI viral moment detection for Shorts/Reels/TikTok.
- [Alternatives](https://www.tubegrow.io/alternatives): Comparison to VidIQ and TubeBuddy.
- [Blog](https://www.tubegrow.io/blog): YouTube growth guides and product updates.
- [About](https://www.tubegrow.io/about): Company and mission.

## Highlights
- AI chat assistant for channel insights
- Real-time analytics dashboards
- YouTube SEO analysis and optimization
- Viral moment detection and clip generation

## Contact
- [Support](mailto:support@tubegrow.io): Email support.
